QuestData.Title: Hunting the Hunters
QuestData.Description: Just south of here on the Lakeridge Highway are a group of Blackrock orcs that stalk the forests under cover of darkness and ambush the uninitiated. That group is the first line of defense for the Blackrock army. They're scouts, reporting everything they see back to their central command. They need to be taken OUT or our mission here could be compromised.$B$BHead south and kill every Blackrock hunter that you see.
QuestData.RewardText: Great work, $n. We need to move quickly before they send for reinforcements.
